1. Downloading Packages to use SNCF API
```{r}

install.packages(c("httr","jsonlite", "lubridate"))

library(httr)
library(jsonlite)
library(lubridate)

```


2. Connecting to SNCF API
```{r}

url <- "https://3b036afe-0110-4202-b9ed-99718476c2e0@api.navitia.io/v1/"
path <- "coverage/"
  
"curl https://3b036afe-0110-4202-b9ed-99718476c2e0@api.navitia.io/v1/coverage/
"

GET(url = url, path = path)

```
